statements: DELETE FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM sensors_data WHERE reading_timestamp = '2022-01-02 08:00:00' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:30:00';
DELETE FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_location = 'Room A' AND reading_value > 50;
DELETE FROM Anomalies WHERE anomaly_id = 100 AND sensor_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND sensor_status = 'Inactive';
DELETE FROM environmental_hazards WHERE hazard_type = 'Earthquake' AND detection_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Hazards WHERE hazard_type = 'Fire' AND hazard_location = 'Building A';
